1.0.0.name: wordpress/donate-via-paypal
1.0.0.description: A wordpress plugins to add paypal donation button after each post content . It has been developed for not profiting organizations . It comes with options to select weather you want to display it on post , pages or both . you can also add some text before your paypal donate banner via options.
